title: I CAN'T MOVE  SOMETIMES IN LEAGUE.. I KEEP ATTEMPTING TO REconnect
body: my ping is normal. my fps is normal. ITS JUST I CANT MOVE... THEN SOMETIMES IT GOES TO ATTEMPTING TO RECONNECT.... PLEASE FIX THIS. I LOST MULTIPLE RANKED GAMES BECAUSE OF THIS.

replies.body: I can't move in league,it is my first time when this happens,i just enter a game,normal,custom,and i can't move,can't click anything or press any button,in game and in client as well i have the normal arrow,not that from league,in the client i can type,but in game nothing works,pls help!
I have same problem bro..In client all goes well, but in game i can t move my champion or open chat,i can t make nothing
i have the same problem too

The game requires a constant connection, and a weakened strength can cause input delays or even disconnection.  It sounds like your network might be suffering from a packet loss issue that's keeping you in place.  My recommending would be to run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader).  The tool will help find out what's going wrong as well as provide a series of instructions to get it fixed up.  I hope that helps!
Wow... My packet loss was 80 percent. Does repairing the client help

That's quite a lot!  Repairing the client wouldn't do too much for your connection, as it focuses more on game files.  The log reader should provide some steps, but I also recommend going over our[ connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your connection.  Let me know how that goes!
Well then. I had already repaired my client when i replied. the problem seems to be fixed but 10 inutes after i got in game my internet shut off
